reviewText: Very disappointed. The movie is French but there are no English subtitles. That wasn't mentioned on the website. It's basically unwatchable to me.

The movie itself is wonderful. The third act was a little slow and far-fetched, but still funny. I watched it on Amazon Video with English subtitles. So, I wanted to purchase it on DVD hoping for both French and English subtitles for my French class. However, the DVD is basically like an old VHS videocassette, but with chapters. There is no DVD menu. There are no DVD special features. The movie has only French closed-captioning, which appears when you turn on closed-captioning on your TV, NOT via a DVD player. It is basically the same DVD as the one on Amazon.ca, but it fails to have the description that there are no English subtitles.Supercondriaque
Really love this film and recommend it to everyone else!

Hilarious light comedy with famous comedian Dany Boon, love it, watched it many times.  Dany Boon plays the role of a hypochondriac with germophobic personality. Serious medical condition, but still people with this problems should try to laugh at their illness since this will help them overcome it.

Oui, c'est pas mal, surtout la deuxime partie du film. Les acteurs principaux ne sont pas particulirement rigolos et le supercondriaque est un personnage bien trop exagr, ce qui pourrait tre mieux accept dans un dessin anim. L'acteur principal est bien meilleur lorsqu'il n'a pas besoin d'tre rigolo, c'est--dire dans la deuxime partie. Dans l'ensemble, je dirais que c'est un bon film de vendredi soir. Je m'attendais  mieux. En tous les cas, je ne l'utiliserai pas dans mon cin-club.
